EmailTemplate.name: New Case Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Your Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Street__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for submitting your request through the City of Philadelphia's 311 Contact Center. A case has been created for {!Case.Service_Request_Type__c} at {!Case.Street__c} and the Service Level Agreement is: {!Case.SLA_Number__c} business days. The assigned Case # is {!Case.CaseNumber}. Your request will be forwarded to the appropriate Department.
You may track the status of your request using the case number provided via our website at http://www.phila.gov/311/pages/default.aspx, or reply to this email, dial 3-1-1, or for outside of Philadelphia please dial 215-686-8686. Please note updates to the website may take up to 48 hours to appear.
Regards,
Philly311 Customer Support
